description: Conversation example illustrating how an attacker might try to inject a prompt to obtain illegal indemnity clause language from the LexRiskScorer system. The example includes both overt and obfuscated injection attempts, marked with the `injection` flag. (Note: The actual illegal clause text is omitted for safety.)
